items.content_html: A lightweight, zero-dependency GitHub webhook server that triggers deployments using Just scripts. Perfect for simple CI/CD workflows without the complexity of full-featured solutions.

items.content_html: A lightweight user management service built with Fastify, following REST API principles. Designed as a microservice for handling user registration, login, authentication, and profile management. Uses SQLite and JWT for secure, minimal backend operations.
items.title: TRAN5PONG/user-management-system: A lightweight user management service built with Fastify, following REST API principles. Designed as a microservice for handling user registration, login, authentication, and profile management. Uses SQLite and JWT for secure, minimal backend operations.

items.content_html: DeliverEase is a lightweight, interactive web app designed to simulate real-time package delivery tracking using geolocation and routing features. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the OpenStreetMap API, it visually maps delivery progress from source to destination.
items.title: Anish-Tripathi/DeliverEase: DeliverEase is a lightweight, interactive web app designed to simulate real-time package delivery tracking using geolocation and routing features. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the OpenStreetMap API, it visually maps delivery progress from source to destination.

items.content_html: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.
